thread.title: Boris Johnson answers questions on expulsion of Russian diplomats in UK parliament

title: Boris Johnson answers questions on expulsion of Russian diplomats in UK parliament
text:
Boris Johnson answers questions on expulsion of Russian diplomats in UK parliament 8:40am EDT - 01:00 
British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson answers questions in UK parliament on expulsion of Russian diplomats. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson answers questions in UK parliament on expulsion of Russian diplomats. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2GBdLT0
